body.para:
I tried to install enterprise pack 5.5 beta on the newest nb55 build
200608220000, but with selecting to install all components no matter I selected
to install the bundled sas9 or to wire it with an existing one, It failed to
install at the same stage, after the "install" button clicked and the
installation process started, and the error message shown like:

The installation of NetBeans Enetrprise Pack 5.5 Beta was cancelled by the user
or an unknown error occurred. The product was not installed. If this was done my
mistake, click Finish and run the wizard again.

If I selected not to install bpel and secure web services then the installation
finished successfully.
Could anybody give some help on this please!
